details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO/FDIS 14289-1:2013 - 7.18 Annotations - PDF/UA Identification Schema.
details.description: Every page on which there is an annotation shall contain in its page dictionary the key Tabs, and its value shall be S.

rule.description: Every page on which there is an annotation shall contain in its page dictionary the key Tabs, and its value shall be S.

error.message: A page containing an annotation does not contain a Tabs key or has a Tabs key with a value other than S.
